entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 2. POP 60%
